There's an opening at GoGet

Get More Stuff Done

iOS Developer

Location
GoGet head office

Role
Permanent

Salary
Dependent on experience

GoGet is looking for iOS Developers to join our team! We are looking for someone who has the passion to push mobile technologies to change the world and drive our community forward.

As a GoGet mobile developer you will be responsible for building the native mobile front end on iOS of our next generation mobile applications. You will have to work with our backend application team to understand and build on top of our APIs that would utilise REST and JSON.

You will also work closely with the rest of the GoGet team to drive our mobile application arm and your ideas could strongly influence our technology decisions for the future. Working with us, you will have a strong voice in our team and together we can work to truly make a difference.

Ideally, you need:

  • to have published one or more iOS app
  • experience working with the iOS framework
  • experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
  • experience working with third-party libraries and APIs, such as google maps
  • working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends and emerging technologies
  • a solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
  • a strong desire for something new and fresh
  • to be resourceful and a “Go-Getter” in life
  • like to eat ice cream

Applicants must have a basic grasp of the English Language and own transportation to work and to travel around.
